SELECT
cla.id, cla.hora_inicio, cla.hora_fin, cla.fecha,
co.id as CO_id,
mat.nombre as MAT_nombre
FROM clase as cla join materia as mat on mat.sigla=cla.materiacohorte_materia_sigla join cohorte as co on co.id=cla.materiacohorte_cohorte_id join periodo as per on co.periodo_periodo=per.periodo;

SELECT
cla.id, cla.hora_inicio, cla.hora_fin, cla.fecha,
co.id as CO_id,
pro.documento as PRO_documento, pro.nombre as PRO_nombre,
mat.sigla as MAT_sigla, mat.nombre as MAT_nombre, mat.creditos as MAT_creditos,
asi.id as MAT_ASI_id, asi.nombre as MAT_ASI_nombre,
pos.id as MAT_ASI_POS_id, pos.nombre as MAT_ASI_POS_nombre
FROM clase as cla join materia as mat on mat.sigla=cla.materiacohorte_materia_sigla join cohorte as co on co.id=cla.materiacohorte_cohorte_id join Asignatura as asi on mat.Asignatura_id = asi.id join Posgrado as pos on asi.Posgrado_id = pos.id join periodo as per on per.periodo=co.periodo_periodo join profesor as pro on pro.documento=cla.materiacohorte_profesor_documento
WHERE per.periodo = #{periodo} ORDER BY asi.id, co.id, cla.fecha

SELECT cla.fecha
FROM clase as cla join cohorte as co on co.id=cla.materiacohorte_cohorte_id join periodo as per on co.periodo_periodo=per.periodo
WHERE per.periodo=#{periodo} GROUP BY cla.fecha

SELECT cla.fecha, cla.hora_inicio, cla.hora_fin FROM clase as cla join cohorte as co on co.id=cla.materiacohorte_cohorte_id join periodo as per on co.periodo_periodo=per.periodo join profesor as pro on pro.documento=cla.materiacohorte_profesor_documento WHERE per.periodo=#{periodo} and pro.nombre=#{nomprof} and cla.fecha=#{date} ORDER BY cla.fecha;

SELECT cla.id , cla.fecha , cla.hora_inicio , cla.hora_fin, mat.nombre as MAT_nombre FROM recurso as rec join recursoclase as reccla on rec.id=reccla.recurso_id join clase as cla on cla.id=reccla.clase_id join materia as mat on cla.materiacohorte_materia_sigla=mat.sigla WHERE rec.id=#{idrec} ORDER BY cla.fecha;

SELECT cla.id , cla.fecha , cla.hora_inicio , cla.hora_fin
FROM clase as cla join materia as mat on cla.materiacohorte_materia_sigla=mat.sigla join profesor as pro on pro.documento=cla.materiacohorte_profesor_documento WHERE cla.materiacohorte_cohorte_id=#{id} and mat.nombre=#{mat} and pro.nombre=#{profe} ORDER BY cla.fecha;
